name: Aaron FAULK, Petitioner v. PHILADELPHIA COMMON PLEAS COURTS, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Faulk v. Philadelphia Common Pleas Courts

parties: Aaron FAULK, Petitioner v. PHILADELPHIA COMMON PLEAS COURTS, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 2nd day of December, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief is GRANTED to the extent Petitioner seeks mandamus relief. The Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County is DIRECTED to dispose of Petitioner’s pending filing within 90 days.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
127 A.3d 1288
Aaron FAULK, Petitioner v. PHILADELPHIA COMMON PLEAS COURTS, Respondent.
No. 129 EM 2015.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 2, 2015.
